channel.title: If I started... Would you use?
channel.description:
Alright, I have 2, 3 gigabyte RAM systems, and each have a 350GIG HDD. and i'm building another one. and a 100mbp/s internet connection.
If I started a website, and started hosting servers and such. How many people would actually use this service? because I don't want to make the site and get everything set up, and no one uses the service.
So how about it? Any ideas? Any suggestions?

item.title: If I started... Would you use?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

I foresee and epic fail in your future.

Read full topic
item.source: If I started... Would you use?

item.title: If I started... Would you use?
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

Alright, two machines will be for paid members, and the other machine will be for free members.
On the free members machine, all the free members server will be shoved into there. (It’s going to have a little bit of lag, but it’s free. don’t complain) the paid members will get what they pay for. Even if it means buying more RAM. The servers will be ran with No-IP. But instead of having everyone on the default port (impossible), there will be different ports as in one of the servers may be 98694 and another 98695.

Any more questions?

Read full topic
item.source: If I started... Would you use?

item.title: If I started... Would you use?
item.dc:creator: @Maedie1 Maedie1
item.description:
@Maedie1 wrote:

But can you go into more detail about the servers? You mentioned “Different ports”. What do you mean? You’re only going to start off with 3 servers?

Read full topic
item.source: If I started... Would you use?

item.title: If I started... Would you use?
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

Lol. Exactly. Most companies charge like 40 dollars for a 2gig RAM server. You don’t really need that for a RSPS. Unless your server has like 400 people. But, that’s unlikely. I am currently putting the design in HTML.
This project is going to be established. If anyone has any ideas, suggestions, or want to help out you are welcome to help. Although I can not pay you right now.

Read full topic
item.source: If I started... Would you use?

item.title: If I started... Would you use?
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

Why not just skip the hassle and have a middleman? Get in contact with Vpsland or another company like that. You can surely sell them both as Dedi’s.

Read full topic
item.source: If I started... Would you use?

item.title: If I started... Would you use?
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

What are you talking about?
They are going to have different ports.

I’ve decided to go ahead and open the project. Like I said, I have to do the website. MoparScape will be the first place I post when I release. I’ll probably put it in here.
I’ve already figured out the plans and stuff. Which i’ll post right now.

Free - 256MB of RAM, 2GB HD, FTP Access, WebHosting(This uses your 2GB HD), Web hosting is optional.

1.99/MO 512MB of RAM, 4GB HD, FTP Access, WebHosting(This uses your 4GB HD), Web hosting is optional.

2.99/MO 1GB of RAM, 8GB HD, FTP Access, 1GB Web Hosting.

When it gets more and more popular, I will start upgrading the systems. Although the free servers are limited, they are free. I am not sure what the URL will be, but I will post that soon.

Read full topic
item.source: If I started... Would you use?

item.source: If I started... Would you use?

item.title: If I started... Would you use?
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

[quote=“DePredaTe, post:5, topic:278551”]There would be different packages. Free, and paid. Free you would get like 256mb of ram and 2gigs of HDD. and the paid packages would vary between how much you want. It wouldn’t be remote desktop. Probably FTP, with a server restart batch file. Paid would also probably come with web hosting too.
I just want to know if people are actually going to use it or not.[/quote]
How would we run/restart from ftp client? :S

Read full topic
item.source: If I started... Would you use?

item.title: If I started... Would you use?
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

That’s kind of what i’m saying.
When I use to have a server, I didn’t want to pay and I didn’t expect a whole lot when I got it free. Then I realized the PC’s I have. So I decided to come back to MoparScape, learn a little more. Then run servers for other people. I know that I didn’t like paying when I ran a private server. But I didn’t expect a whole lot. But some people want to pay, and get more out of it. I know that 256MB isn’t a lot of RAM. But you are getting it free.
I think I will be releasing it. I am going to sketch out the site, draw it on photoshop, then put it in HTML and then code it in PHP. I am not sure how long this will take, maybe a couple days. I’ll post the URL in this thread.

Read full topic
item.source: If I started... Would you use?
